00032 #ifndef RENDERTHREAD_HPP_
00033 #define RENDERTHREAD_HPP_

00035 using namespace std;

00037 namespace ebl {
00038   
00039   template<class T>
00040   void RenderThread::draw_matrix(Idx<T> &im, unsigned int h0, unsigned int w0, 
00041                                  T minv, T maxv, double zoomw, double zoomh) {
00042     Idx<ubyte> *uim = new Idx<ubyte>(grey_image_to_ubyte<T>(im, minv, maxv, 
00043                                                             zoomw, zoomh));
00044     // send image to main gui thread
00045     emit gui_drawImage(uim, h0, w0);
00046   }
00047 
00048   template<class T>
00049   void RenderThread::draw_matrix_frame(Idx<T> &im, ubyte r, ubyte g, ubyte b,
00050                                        unsigned int h0, unsigned int w0, 
00051                                        T minv, T maxv, 
00052                                        double zoomw, double zoomh) {
00053     Idx<ubyte> uim = grey_image_to_ubyte<T>(im, minv, maxv, zoomw, zoomh);
00054     Idx<ubyte> tmp(uim.dim(0) + 2, uim.dim(1) + 2);
00055     Idx<ubyte> *fim = new Idx<ubyte>(tmp);
00056     Idx<ubyte> tmp2 = tmp.narrow(0, uim.dim(0), 1);
00057     tmp2 = tmp2.narrow(1, uim.dim(1), 1);
00058     idx_copy(uim, tmp2);
00059     tmp2 = tmp.narrow(0, 1, 0); idx_fill(tmp2, r);
00060     tmp2 = tmp.narrow(0, 1, tmp.dim(0) - 1); idx_fill(tmp2, r);
00061     tmp2 = tmp.narrow(1, 1, 0); idx_fill(tmp2, r);
00062     tmp2 = tmp.narrow(1, 1, tmp.dim(1) - 1); idx_fill(tmp2, r);
00063     // send image to main gui thread
00064     emit gui_drawImage(fim, h0, w0);
00065   }
00066 
00067   template<class T1, class T2>
00068   class ManipInfra {
00069   public:
00070     ManipInfra(RenderThread& (*pFun) (RenderThread&))
00071       : manipFun0(pFun), val1(0), val2(0), nval(0) {}
00072     ManipInfra(RenderThread& (*pFun) (RenderThread&, T1), T1 val1_)
00073       : manipFun1(pFun), val1(val1_), val2(0), nval(1) {}
00074     ManipInfra(RenderThread& (*pFun) (RenderThread&, T1, T2), 
00075                T1 val1_, T2 val2_)
00076       : manipFun2(pFun), val1(val1_), val2(val2_), nval(2) {}
00077 
00078     void operator() (RenderThread& r) const {
00079       switch (nval) {
00080       case 0: manipFun0(r); break ;
00081       case 1: manipFun1(r, val1); break ;
00082       case 2: manipFun2(r, val1, val2); break ;
00083       default: ylerror("unknown mode");
00084       }
00085     }
00086   private:
00087     RenderThread& (*manipFun0) (RenderThread&);
00088     RenderThread& (*manipFun1) (RenderThread&, T1);
00089     RenderThread& (*manipFun2) (RenderThread&, T1, T2);
00090     T1 val1;
00091     T2 val2;
00092     int nval;
00093   };
00094 
00095   RenderThread& att(RenderThread& r, unsigned int h0, unsigned int w0);
00096   ManipInfra<unsigned int, unsigned int> at(unsigned int h0, unsigned int w0);
00097 
00098   RenderThread& fcout_and_gui(RenderThread& r);
00099   ManipInfra<int, int> cout_and_gui();
00100 
00101   RenderThread& fgui_only(RenderThread& r);
00102   ManipInfra<int, int> gui_only();
00103 
00104   template<class T1, class T2> 
00105   RenderThread& operator<<(RenderThread& r, const ManipInfra<T1, T2> &manip) {
00106     manip(r);
00107     return r;
00108   }
00109 
00110   template<class T> 
00111   RenderThread& operator<<(RenderThread& r, const T val) {
00112     ostringstream o;
00113     o << val;
00114     r.add_text(new std::string(o.str()));
00115     if (r.cout_output)
00116       cout << o.str() << flush;
00117     return r;
00118   }
